message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. I believe its worth extends far beyond what meets the eye, and I am confident it will be a valuable asset for you as well. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my desire to find a buyer who truly appreciates its true worth. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.
